title: Small‑scale farming (crops & livestock)
desc: We provide seeds, training and low‑interest loans so farmers can boost yields, diversify livestock and build lasting agro‑enterprises that feed families and strengthen our local economy.

title: Bricklaying & masonry
desc: Our masonry workshops teach modern techniques and supply micro‑credit for tools—enabling masons to construct safe, durable homes, schools and clinics that stand the test of time.

title: Carpentry & joinery
desc: Through hands‑on training and startup grants, we empower carpenters to craft furniture, doors and windows—fostering micro‑businesses that serve homes, churches and community centers.

title: Plumbing
desc: We offer certification courses and equipment financing so local plumbers can install clean water systems, maintain sanitation infrastructure and improve health outcomes across Lubaga.

title: Electrical installation
desc: Our electrical training programs and business loans equip electricians to wire homes, schools and clinics—ensuring reliable power and safer communities.

title: Painting & decorating
desc: From community halls to private homes, we fund and coach painters on quality techniques—adding beauty, protection and pride to every painted surface.

title: Motorcycle repair
desc: Our boda‑boda mechanics get tool kits and business mentorship—so they can keep hundreds of riders safe, earn fair wages and provide vital transport services.

title: Car mechanics & auto repair
desc: With diagnostic training and startup capital, aspiring mechanics learn to service vehicles professionally—keeping taxis and private cars running smoothly.

title: Bodywork & spray painting
desc: We support auto‑body artisans with materials and marketing guidance—helping them restore vehicles to like‑new condition and build loyal customer bases.

title: Retail trade
desc: Our micro‑loan program helps shopkeepers stock essential goods at fair prices—strengthening local supply chains and ensuring families have what they need every day.

title: Wholesale distribution
desc: By pooling orders and offering bulk‑buy finance, we enable distributors to import and supply groceries, hardware and farming inputs more affordably.

title: Soap making
desc: We teach sustainable soap‑making methods and offer seed capital—so entrepreneurs can produce eco‑friendly soaps that improve hygiene and generate income.

title: Brick & tile making
desc: Our kiln‑building workshops and material financing help local manufacturers produce quality bricks and tiles—fueling construction projects across Lubaga.

title: Basket weaving & handicrafts
desc: Through artisan collectives and micro‑grants, we preserve traditional weaving skills—transforming local fibers into marketable baskets and giftware.

title: Pottery & ceramics
desc: From clay sourcing to kiln operation, our pottery programs empower creators to produce functional and decorative ceramics for home use and tourism.

title: Tailoring & fashion design
desc: We offer pattern‑making workshops and sewing‑machine micro‑loans—helping tailors launch custom apparel brands that reflect Lubaga’s vibrant style.

title: Catering & food services
desc: Our catering incubator provides kitchen space, training and event‑booking support—enabling cooks to launch businesses for weddings, parties and community gatherings.

title: Baking (bread, cakes, pastries)
desc: With recipe development classes and baking‑equipment loans, we help artisans produce fresh breads, cakes and pastries that delight customers every morning.

title: Barbershops & beauty salons
desc: Our cosmetology programs and small‑business grants equip stylists and barbers to deliver top‑quality grooming services—boosting confidence and local employment.

title: Herbal medicine & healing
desc: We support traditional healers with herb‑garden grants and safety training—preserving indigenous remedies while ensuring community health standards.

title: Health clinics & mobile health
desc: Through microfinance and training, we expand community clinics and mobile‐health units—bringing essential medical services to underserved neighborhoods.

title: Solar installation
desc: Our clean‑energy fund provides panels and training—enabling households and businesses to adopt solar power, reduce bills and protect the environment.

title: Computer repair & IT
desc: We offer ICT courses and startup kits so technicians can repair computers, set up networks and deliver affordable tech support to local schools and entrepreneurs.

title: Vocational training
desc: Our skills‐training academy offers certified courses in carpentry, plumbing, electrical work and more—equipping youth with marketable trades.

title: Financial literacy & savings
desc: Through workshops and peer‐mentorship, we teach budgeting, savings strategies and responsible borrowing—empowering members to grow their wealth.

title: Microfinance lending
desc: Our microloan schemes provide accessible credit at fair rates—helping entrepreneurs launch or expand businesses and drive local economic growth.

title: Waste collection & recycling
desc: We fund eco‑driven waste‐management startups and run recycling drives—keeping our streets clean and creating green jobs.

title: Tree planting & environmental
desc: Through community‐led tree‑planting campaigns, we restore green spaces, improve air quality and foster environmental stewardship for future generations.

title: Hair salons & barbers
desc: From cutting‐edge styling courses to startup loans, we help hairdressers and barbers launch thriving salons that serve every member of our community.
